item.description:
Weekend Tantra Immersion with Dawn Cartwright

During this level 2 weekend immersion for singles and couples we'll explore the realm of Tantra as it applies to love, relationship and intimacy.



You'll learn Tantric meditations, empowering partner yoga practices, breakthrough communication tools, acupressure to awaken the ecstatic channels -- all designed to intensify your experience of intimacy. You'll be introduced to the first stages of a Tantric lovemaking sequence -- you'll discover new ways to expand your experience of openness and closeness in lovemaking.



Through relationship we have the opportunity to meet ourselves more deeply than ever before, to recognize the outer union to be a reflection of the union within, to ignite more fully our ecstatic potential and to live it -- in every aspect of our lives.



The love you know is possible, already exists. Through devotion and dedicated practice it is not only possible to experience this love -- it is what the entire universe is longing for with all its heart. Live as the love you are. Discover the ecstasy of your own heart.



Ecstasy of the Heart -- Level 2 Tantra Immersion

Boston, Massachusetts

November 16-18, 2012

$500 per person

$400 early bird, paid in full by Oct 16th

+ $150 for meals & lodging





Please make sure you read the cancellation policy information: http://www.chandrabindutantrainstitute.com/register.shtml



Or send a check made out to Dawn Cartwright and send to: Chandra Bindu Tantra Institute • 2524 5th Street #3 • Santa Monica • CA • 90405



CONTACT: ROBYN VOGEL 508-380-9254 

ROBYN@SACREDTANTRICFIRE.COM
item.name: Ecstasy of the Heart with Dawn Cartwright
